mapper.insert: insert into offersum (offerSumid, offerSumDeadline, admitBuyid, `sum`, offerSumName, offerSumEvent, offerSumTime, offerperiods) values (#{offersumid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{offersumdeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{admitbuyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offersumname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offersumevent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{offersumtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{offerperiods,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update offersum set offerSumDeadline = #{offersumdeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admitBuyid = #{admitbuyid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `sum` = #{sum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offerSumName = #{offersumname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offerSumEvent = #{offersumevent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, offerSumTime = #{offersumtime,jdbcType=DATE}, offerperiods = #{offerperiods,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where offerSumid = #{offersumid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select offerSumid, offerSumDeadline, admitBuyid, `sum`, offerSumName, offerSumEvent, offerSumTime, offerperiods from offersum where offerSumid = #{offersumid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select offerSumid, offerSumDeadline, admitBuyid, `sum`, offerSumName, offerSumEvent, offerSumTime, offerperiods from offersum
